title: vElan varAnO
sahitya:
(rAgA:  SaNmukhapriyA)   
  vElan varAnO endan mana vEdanai tIrAnO vaDi-


anupallavi

  kOla mAmayil mEl amarndu sEval koDiyum vElum piDittiDum vaDi-
			(rAg  nATakapriyA)


caraNam 1    mAdennai aDuttAn anru maiyal adanaik-koDuttAn kAdarkkaNai toDuttAn adaik-kanni enmEl
			(madhyamakAlam)
pEdai ennai anru pirindu shenravan shOdanai sheidadum pOdumenrE inru
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  rasikapriyA)Aa:S R3 G3 M2 P D3 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D3 P M2 G3 R3 S  inru avan vArAnO enadu innalait-tIrAnO enrumE vArAnO ennai EmATrap-pOrAnO
			(madhyamakAlam)
inrO nALaiyO enrE dinamum Engi Engi vInguden manamum
